@HugeMorningwood
Yea it really does, most of the characters die in the end, the story is Quentin Tarantino levels of fucked-up. Household Affairs 1-74 really is NOT a hentai, (74.5-77 is just after-story stuff) watching the narrative gave me existential-dysphoria. ButcherBoy has serious storytelling chops, like he could write shit like Kite (1998) or Black Lagoon. Household Affairs 78+, a.k.a. "Chicken Club" is a real hentai thou, by the looks of it anyway, so far.
